# heading

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates the heading of the person’s device.

## Declaration

```swift
var heading: CLHeading? { get }
```

## Accessing the user’s location and heading

- **location**: An object that describes the current location of the persons’s device, including the latitude and longitude.

items.description: An object that describes the current location of the persons’s device, including the latitude and longitude.
